Alias.name: March Troops
Alias.script: snd.send("order "..snd.current_division.." march " .. matches[2]) snd.send("qeb " .. matches[2]) snd.send("path find "..snd.marching_destination)

Alias.name: Set March Destination
Alias.script: snd.marching_destination = matches[2] snd.message("New troop destination is: "..matches[2], "atk")
